entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature steady near zero.

entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
